name: Budget.io
description: Created & maintaining open-source application for managing personal budgets built in Laravel using Inertia.js integrations with Vue.js.

name: ApeHaven
description: Contributing to the ApeHaven project, a website/app focused around $APES, a frictionless yield generating charity token that benefits sanctuaries for Great Apes.

name: Tipoff
description: Contributing to open-source repositories that act as a full suite for escape rooms. This includes escape room management, an online ecommerce solution, and support for a main site/blog.

name: Portfolio
description: Created & maintaining personal platform listing personal experience including personal blog and all Laravel projects I maintain, all managed within a Laravel Forge instance.

name: Resume
description: Created & maintaining web-based version of resume/cv responsive in desktop, mobile, and print resolutions.
